alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued March 10 at 3:53AM HST until March 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... .A large long period northwest swell will slowly decrease through the day and continue to bring warning level surf along exposed north and west facing shores of the smaller islands and to west facing shores of the Big Island. The swell will continue to decline into the weekend. ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 20 to 25 feet along north facing shores and 15 to 20 feet along exposed west facing shores. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Maui, Molokai, Niihau and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
